pages.text: $(item)Elemental Oils$() are essential $(marked)crafting components$() in witchcraft. They are made out of a type of $(l:bewitchment:introduction/bark)$(item)Bark$() and other components.$(br)To craft a phew bottles of oil, throw a piece of bark into a boiling $(l:bewitchment:introduction/cauldron)$(item)Cauldron$() first, then add the other ingredients.$(br)Once it reaches a pleasant, matching color, you can bottle it.
$(item)Cleansing Balm$() is associated with light, and is just as bright.
Associated with the principle of darkness, $(item)Grim Elixir$() is dark, like blood.
$(item)Aqua Cerate$() is blue, like water.$(br)Any type of fish may be used for this.
$(item)Fiery Serum$() is of bright orange. It incorporates the principle of the flame.
$(item)Heaven Extract$() is completely white and represents air.$(br2)$(o)Be careful not to throw the Mandrake Root in first, or you might accidentally create a brew.$()
